channel.title: [Please look] No-IP Account! [Need Help] [Please LOOK!]
channel.description: [b]Help! A friend from me asked to Run [/b] His [b] No-IP account.[/b] I accepted it and runned hist server [b]about 2 weeks.[/b] Now i want to host ma own server again, but i dont know how to Edite the No-IP account so i can host my No-IP. If u Pos. can help please reply it or add my msn : Jelle_psv@msn.com I would also use Teamviewer so.. Pm me for the ID/Pass! Thanks For Reading!

item.title: [Please look] No-IP Account! [Need Help] [Please LOOK!]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I_Hybrid_I:

No.

Lol oki i pm u the problem.
[/quote]

Why? The purpose of this section isn’t to ask for help, and then commence PM’ing someone for an answer. That defeats the purpose of a forum. In fact, chances are if I don’t solve your problem, you will undoubtedly come back to this post, leaving out all information from the PM conversation, or create and identical topic with no more information than this.

Read full topic

item.title: [Please look] No-IP Account! [Need Help] [Please LOOK!]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:5, topic:396104”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=493283.msg3606529#msg3606529 date=1306173584]

Go into the settings, change the email account you login with, then the hosts will change to those associated with your account.

Lol i wish you was right, i already tried it.
Errm would ya try to do it with TeamViewer?
Or contact my msn? : jelle_psv@msn.com

When you tried, what happened? Did you refresh your host list? Do you have any hosts associated with your account?
[/quote]

Errm cant ya just add me on my msn than we can talk:o[/quote]

No.

Read full topic
